metadata.title: USN-4457-1 -- Software Properties vulnerability
metadata.description: Jason A. Donenfeld discovered that Software Properties incorrectly filtered certain escape sequences when displaying PPA descriptions. If a user were tricked into adding an arbitrary PPA, a remote attacker could possibly manipulate the screen.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4457-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  software-properties-common - 0.96.24.32.14 software-properties-kde - 0.96.24.32.14 python3-software-properties - 0.96.24.32.14 software-properties-gtk - 0.96.24.32.14 No subscription required
